>>37693535
that doesn't answer my question. The Nameless gunner, called A for ease of posting, did not have a UI on her person. This leaves us with two possiblities
>1. A gave the other Nameless her UI
>2. A lost her UI somehow

Now, once we've established this, we can find out who the UI's belong to
>1. They are trophies, taken off killed players
>2. They are the party's UI's, however the number of UI's found disprove this
>3. They are a combination of the two, as A lacked one and the brawler had multiple

My question, rephrased, is whose UI's were?
name: Anonymous
